title: Just Simply – Stop saying how simple things are in our docs
dot: digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontsize=12, fontname="Arial"]; subgraph cluster_intro{label="Introduction";style=dashed;intro[label="If docs are hard to read, it's not 'simple'"];} subgraph cluster_problems{label="Common Issues";style=dashed;problem1[label="Using words like 'easy', 'just', 'painless'"];problem2[label="Assuming users find it straightforward"];problem3[label="Users feel condescended"];} subgraph cluster_solutions{label="Solutions";style=dashed;solution1[label="Remove condescending words"];solution2[label="Enhance clarity without losing enthusiasm"];solution3[label="Provide clear examples"];}subgraph cluster_example{label="Example Comparison";style=dashed;original[label="Original Text\n'...painfully simple...'"];edited[label="Edited Text\n'...to set this up...'"];}intro->problem1;intro->problem2;intro->problem3;problem1->solution1;problem2->solution2;problem3->solution3;solution1->original;solution1->edited;original->edited;}
